Text: can you use it for windows 7??

Application installed and works better than expected - by that I mean the video capture is smooth and clear out performing all other screen capture software I've tried. The video output once the frames/second is adjusted up to 8 fps from the default 5 fps the output is indistinguishable from the original video file.

Thank you.
This file contains a trojan!!! my virus scan found it and deleted it.  The program installs and runs just fine after removal of the trojan.  But beware!
